plot: Paris and Nicole enjoy their last day of freedom before being sent to live on a farm in the middle of nowhere.

The girls move into the farm where we meet their hosts, the Ledding family. They freak out over chicken plucking and the enormous tick in their bedroom overtop a well. The dad lays down the rules but when have the Hiltons ever obeyed them? And both girls decide the oldest son deserves a little reminder of this trip.....—SimpleLife
